DDL.statement: INSERT INTO [dbo].[SYS_MODULES] ([MODULE_ID], [DESCRIPTION], [RF_ACTIVE], [DK_ACTIVE], [MODULE_TYPE], [HINT], [MNEMONIC], [ICON_FILENAME], [HELPSET_ID], [REPORT_FILENAME], [EXEC_FILENAME], [EXEC_DIR], [PRINT_PREVIEW], [PRINT_DIALOG], [PRINT_COPIES]) VALUES (N'FRM_ADMIN_INTERFACE_REQUEST', N'Interface Request Admin', N'N', N'Y', N'FORM', N'', CAST(0 AS Numeric(38, 0)), N'connect.gif', N'', N'', N'', N'', N'Y', N'Y', 1)
INSERT INTO [dbo].[SYS_MENUS] ([MODULE_ID], [MENU_ID], [SEQUENCE_ID]) VALUES (N'FRM_ADMIN_INTERFACE_REQUEST', N'MENU_INTERFACE', CAST(4 AS Numeric(38, 0)))
